title.rendered: Global City – a Magic Box of Bundle of Opportunities is about to Open

content.rendered:
The much-awaited Global City is on the verge of becoming a reality within the next year or two. It is an exceptional city concept that addresses the needs of Gurugram, an international hub hosting numerous Fortune 500 companies and boasting tens of thousands of skyscrapers. The city is well-equipped with utilities such as metro, highways, expressways, electricity, sewerage, and water, catering to people from all walks of life.

Global City is planned to be situated at the heart of Gurugram, spanning sectors 36 and 37 along the Dwarka expressway, in close proximity to National Highway (NH-48) and not far from the international airport. But what exactly is a Global City? It is a city that wields international political influence, houses multinational corporations and non-governmental organizations, possesses globally influential mass media, and boasts a well-developed communication and transportation system. All these elements will be integral parts of the upcoming Global City in Gurugram.

Undoubtedly, this is a significant achievement for Gurugram, and we take great pride in it. We are poised to present our city as India’s best-planned city within a city—a city that encompasses residential, commercial, and industrial zones, as well as dedicated spaces for healthcare, educational institutions, and more. The city will have its own sewage and waste management system, a heliport, and even a university. The government is meticulously overseeing the project to ensure top-quality standards in all aspects. This will attract investments from leading companies in India and abroad, stimulating employment and generating revenue.

Global City will be a source of immense pride for our country and its residents. It will elevate the city’s status to the next level, comparable to renowned global cities such as New York, Washington, Paris, and London. Businesses will flourish, and both national and international investments will pour in, not only in the real estate sector but also in industries like IT, automobile, garments, and others. The proposed project will cover over a thousand acres of land and will be developed in various phases, with utility infrastructure construction set to commence soon.

Let us not forget that Gurugram’s strength lies not only in its political influence but also in its unparalleled presence in sectors such as IT, automobile, garments, employment, and real estate. The government is harnessing this potential. During a recent visit, the Haryana Chief Secretary instructed local authorities to develop new roads between the national capital and Gurugram, in addition to existing ones, to improve commuting. Streamlining travel between the national capital, the international airport, and Gurugram will boost businesses, particularly the real estate sector, which will witness a significant surge in property appreciation.

Signature Global, a renowned developer, introduced two highly sought-after projects, Signature Global City 37D and Signature Global City 37D II, located in Sector 37D. These projects offer exceptional investment prospects due to their strategic location near the upcoming Global City in Sectors 36, along the under-construction Dwarka Expressway.

Signature Global Projects Near Global City in Gurgaon

Signature Global City 37D:


Spanning over 20.5 acres, Signature Global City 37D presents a premium residential project that boasts exquisite designs and luxurious amenities. The recent cabinet approval for the metro line passing through Sector 37 further enhances the connectivity of this area, making it a desirable location for residents. With its prime position next to the Dwarka Expressway, residents can enjoy seamless travel and easy access to major destinations in Gurgaon and Delhi. This project offers independent floors that are in high demand among investors and homebuyers.


Signature Global City 37D II:


Another impressive project by Signature Global, Signature Global City 37D II, sprawls across 5.6 acres and offers a range of premium independent floors. With luxurious amenities and superb connectivity, these independent floors are highly sought after in the market. The project enjoys excellent connectivity to major highways like NH8, Pataudi Road, and is just 2 kilometers away from the Dwarka Expressway.

In line with these developments, the Haryana government is contemplating a new housing policy to meet the growing demand in urban areas. Embracing the green building concept in construction is a priority to combat pollution and address global warming. Leading the way, real estate promoter Signature Global has already adopted green building practices, making eco-friendliness an integral part of every housing construction in the city, resulting in a bright and beautiful environment.

Global City will open up vast business opportunities across multiple fields, solidifying Gurugram’s position as a thriving global destination.
